message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $20,000. I think it will be incredibly valuable for you.
Thank you for considering me for the product, Alice. I appreciate the value it holds for you, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $20,000 is already a significant discount on my end. Could you meet me at $17,000? I'm confident you'll see a return on this investment.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I believe we can still find common ground. I am willing to pay up to $15,000 for the product. Could we possibly agree on a price closer to that amount?
